title: 1. Surplus Collection
description: Local farms, restaurants, and businesses donate surplus food to our platform. This can include fresh produce, packaged goods, and prepared meals.

title: 2. Quality Check
description: Our team performs a thorough quality check to ensure that all donated food meets safety and freshness standards. We prioritize nutritious and high-quality items.

title: 3. Listing and Distribution
description: The approved surplus food items are listed on our platform, complete with details and images. Community members can browse and select the items they want.

title: 4. Local Pickup Points
description: To minimize environmental impact, we encourage users to pick up their selected items from designated local pickup points. This fosters community engagement and reduces transportation emissions.

title: 5. Community Connection
description: Food donors, recipients, and volunteers form a vibrant community that values sustainability. We believe in fostering connections and sharing the joy of good food and a healthier planet.

title: 6. Impact Measurement
description: We regularly measure and share the positive impact of our community's efforts. This includes the number of meals served, food waste reduced, and the overall contribution to a more sustainable food system.
